QuestData.Title: Seen Better Days
QuestData.Description: The world is unraveling around us, $n. Old enemies seek to destroy us from one end, while ancient forces close in on the other.$B$B<Elder Sareth'na sighs.>$B$BI have seen better days - brighter days, and I long for them...$B$BAcross Stonetalon Peak lies the ruins of our old outpost - now overrun with darkness. If you happen to go that way, could you search for my sketch book? It holds many happy memories. I would reward you well for its return.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you found my sketch book?
QuestData.RewardText: You've found it! Elune bless you, child! Perhaps this book will give me the strength to carry on.
